about_the_game:
Ghost Carver invites you to explore your maximum potential in every track. The primary feature of this game is the ability to achieve extremely high speeds through precision driving, giving you the freedom to choose your own racing path. Precise controls, intense combat, highly engaging tracks, and well-balanced opponents all come together to create a challenging yet fair racing experience.

Highlights
  • Simple, intuitive controls
  • Extremely precise hovercar handling
  • Immense sense of speed
  • Seamlessly integrated vehicular combat
  • Moment-to-moment risk and reward balance
  • Freedom to carve your own ideal racing line

Overall Racing Experience
Whether you prefer victory by combat, or pure driving finesse, all play styles are viable. Standard racing control actions are seamlessly combined with unique combat abilities to fend off opponents while weaving through each track. Every moment is an opportunity to hold your position, or take risks to build even more speed. The choice is yours!

Hovercars
There are 16 hovercars to choose from, each possessing unique handling characteristics to match any preference. From lightweight and agile, to heavy and durable, plenty of options exist to suit every play style. Play through the main career mode to unlock more hovercars beyond the starting lineup.

Tracks
There are 24 unique tracks, each providing their own distinct racing experience. Tracks range from narrow and intricate to wide open and vast, with everything in between. Play through the main career mode to unlock more tracks, and freely explore the unique experience that each has to offer.

Summary
All core racing mechanics have been meticulously tuned to provide the most satisfying balance of risk and reward. Combined with near limitless levels of speed, these mechanics create a truly exhilarating experience that is endlessly enticing. Are you ready to explore your potential?

short_description: Ghost Carver is a futuristic combat racing game that rewards precision driving with near unlimited speed. Seek your own path, fend off opponents with close-range combat, and unleash your maximum potential in every track!
